title: 820-00281 shorted battery?
message:
Hey there. 2017 A1707 with dead display and battery. USB charger first showed pulsing 5V - 16V in loop. After disconnecting the battery macbook booted, display is obviously dead (flexgate) but external worked.

When reconnecting the battery, USB charger begins to loop again. Found a burnt USB-C port and CB501 was off from one pad. Resoldered but no change for loop.
PPVBAT_G3H_CONN is 12,66V

Is this just a dead battery?

title: 820-00281 shorted battery?
message:
Check Q7030/40 for short between all D-S pins.
Also check resistance (ohm scale) over C7020/23.

title: 820-00281 shorted battery?
message:
Sorry, what's D-S pins? I guess you mean the pins of Q7030/40 - no shorts

C7020/23 0.00Ohm

title: 820-00281 shorted battery?
message:
All the pins are marked on the schematic; D1, S1, etc.
Need to check between any D-S pair.
Check the same for Q7065.

title: 820-00281 shorted battery?
message:
Q7065 no short. Pin 5 is one pin on the schematics but 4 real pins on the chip, is that correct?
All pins O.L.
Pin 1-3 .373 diode
Pin 1 & 5 .427 diode

P.S. Can i use A2141 Display Panel for this A1707?

[ATTACH]60427[/ATTACH]

title: 820-00281 shorted battery?
message:
All USB-C ports have the same behavior?

You should test with known good battery.

title: 820-00281 shorted battery?
message: No, one port from JB500 doesnt work at all. Macbook is booting from all other ports.

title: 820-00281 shorted battery?
message: You should solve that problem first.

title: 820-00281 shorted battery?
message: I thought i did with all 3 ports booting the machine. How to proceed?

title: 820-00281 shorted battery?
message:
Post some readings (voltage and diode mode) from non working port.
Compare values with other good port.
